original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
This role is a critical bridge between business needs and technical solutions, requiring a unique blend of business acumen and technical proficiency. As a Configuration Specialist, you will be responsible for understanding complex business processes, translating them into effective system configurations, and ensuring the accuracy and efficiency of our mission-critical systems. Your primary focus will be on developing new processes and solutions within the vehicle configuration space, leveraging the power of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to drive innovation and optimization.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed business requirements, document them using industry-standard techniques, and ensure a clear understanding of the underlying needs.
- Translate these business requirements into robust technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting and resolving any configuration-related issues.
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, utilizing data querying, reporting, and visualization tools to drive data-driven decisions.
- Proactively identify opportunities to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through configuration changes and the implementation of industry best practices.
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate the solutions.
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing maintenance and future enhancements.
- Collaborate cross-functionally with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure the smooth implementation and continuous support of the system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to think critically and identify innovative solutions.
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, with the ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.
- Proficiency in business process analysis and mapping, with a deep understanding of how to optimize workflows and drive operational efficiency.
- Hands-on experience with data manipulation, analysis, and visualization using a variety of tools and techniques.

Preferred Skills:
- Expertise in Java programming language, with the ability to develop and maintain custom configurations and integrations.
- Proficiency in SQL, with the ability to write complex queries and analyze data to uncover insights.
- Experience in the application of machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques to solve complex business problems.

Required Experience:
- Demonstrated experience in implementing and optimizing machine learning (ML) solutions in a production environment.
- A track record of successfully translating business requirements into technical configurations and driving continuous process improvements.

Preferred Experience:
- Experience working in an Agile development environment, with a strong understanding of Agile methodologies and their application.
- Familiarity with the vehicle configuration domain, including knowledge of industry-specific processes and challenges.

Required Tools:
- Proficiency in using [mention specific system] and its configuration management tools.
- Experience with data querying and reporting tools, such as SQL, Tableau, or Power BI.
- Familiarity with version control systems and collaboration tools, such as Git and Jira.

The Configuration Specialist role is a unique opportunity to bridge the gap between business requirements and technical solutions, leveraging your exceptional analytical skills and deep understanding of complex systems. As a key member of our team, you will be responsible for translating intricate business processes into efficient and effective system configurations, ensuring the accuracy and reliability of our mission-critical applications.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with cross-functional stakeholders, including business analysts, subject matter experts, and IT professionals, to gather comprehensive requirements and document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows).
- Analyze and interpret these business requirements, identifying opportunities to optimize workflows and enhance system performance through innovative configuration changes.
- Develop and maintain detailed configuration specifications, ensuring that all technical implementations align with the agreed-upon business needs.
- Configure, implement, and test new system features and functionality within our [mention specific system] backend, including data mappings, integrations, and custom configurations.
- Proactively monitor system performance, analyze data, and identify areas for improvement, using advanced querying, reporting, and visualization tools to drive data-driven decision-making.
- Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT) and work closely with the development team to resolve any configuration-related issues, ensuring seamless system operations.
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of all system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps, serving as a subject matter expert and supporting ongoing maintenance and future enhancements.
- Foster strong collaborative relationships with IT support, developers, and other stakeholders, ensuring the smooth implementation and continuous support of the system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving abilities, with a keen eye for detail and a talent for identifying innovative solutions.
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.
- Proficiency in business process analysis and mapping, with a deep understanding of how to optimize workflows and drive operational efficiency.
- Hands-on experience with data manipulation, analysis, and visualization using a variety of tools and techniques, including SQL, Tableau, and Power BI.

Preferred Skills:
- Expertise in Java programming language, with the ability to develop and maintain custom configurations and integrations.
- Strong background in machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) techniques, with the ability to apply these technologies to solve complex business problems.
- Familiarity with Agile development methodologies and their application in a fast-paced, iterative environment.

Required Experience:
- Demonstrated track record of successfully translating business requirements into technical configurations and driving continuous process improvements.
- Hands-on experience in implementing and optimizing machine learning (ML) solutions in a production environment.

Preferred Experience:
- Experience working in the vehicle configuration domain, with a deep understanding of industry-specific processes and challenges.
- Familiarity with Agile development practices, including experience with tools like Jira and Git.

Required Tools:
- Proficiency in using [mention specific system] and its configuration management tools.
- Expertise in data querying and reporting tools, such as SQL, Tableau, and Power BI.
- Familiarity with version control systems and collaboration platforms, including Git and Jira.

As a Configuration Specialist, you will play a pivotal role in bridging the gap between complex business requirements and cutting-edge technical solutions. This position demands a unique blend of business acumen, analytical prowess, and technical expertise, allowing you to translate intricate processes into efficient and effective system configurations. Your primary focus will be on developing innovative solutions
